site.notes: Historic ranch with TB-era health retreat/sanatorium function, now operated as a museum by the Oracle Historical Society. Ghost hunts and paranormal tours are conducted exclusively by third-party operators (Haunted Rooms, Ghost Hunters Adventures, Wicked City Ghost Tours). Be explicit in coding: 'sanatorium' framing comes from tour operators, not the museum itself. Mixed status: museum is open for daytime visits; ghost hunts are via partners.

evidence.description: Oracle Historical Society official site documents the institutional and historical context of Acadia Ranch as a TB-era health and retreat site.
